entry.title: 3M Breathe Easy BE-10-3 - Breathe Easy Hood White Regular 7000005591
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Parts
Price: 139.10

[shortdesc]

3M Breathe Easy Hood, BE-10-3, white, regular

  • 3M Breathe Easy Hood BE-10-3 is a lightweight, comfortable respirator hood that helps provide respiratory protection for a wide range of applications
  • It is intended for use with 3M Air-Mate Powered Air Purifying Respirators Systems, Breathe Easy PAPR Systems and 3M Supplied Air Hood Systems BE-Series.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Breathe Easy
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Parts

    Extra Product Information

  • Powered Air Purifying Respirators are motorized systems powered by a battery pack which draw air through a filter or cartridge to provide respiratory protection to the wearer
  • The blower unit can be mounted on the waist, face, or head, depending on the sy

    • Product Information

  • Lightweight
  • Comfortable
  • Can be used for a variety of applications
  • Constant flow of air can provide cooling for the worker, resulting in greater comfort for the wearer
  • Loose-fitting headgear options provide respiratory protection without the need for a tight faceseal or fit testing
  • Battery-powered blower pulls the air through the filter resulting in no additional breathing resistance to the wearer

    • Suggested Application

  • Double bib hood
  • US OSHA APF of 1000
    		•

entry.title: Dynabrade 10690 - Filter/Regulator/Lubricator Frl40 1/2 Inch Nptassembly
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Parts
Price: 427.16

[shortdesc]
  • Filter/Regulator/Lubricator, FRL40, 1/2 Inch NPTAssy.
  • Not Compatible w/10681
  • Use air preparation devices, such as Filter-Regulator-Lubricators (FRL Units) are an excellent means of keeping your air supply in top condition, as well as enabling your tools and equipment to operate at their peak performance
  • Unit has modular connections with mounting brackets for easy installation.
  • 1/2 Inch NPT Inlet/Outlet Ports
  • Also included are bushings (2) to reduce the 1/2 Inch NPT openings of the Filter-Regulator-Lubricator to 3/8 Inch NPT.
  • Filter: Five-micron filter element is standard
  • Manually rotate drain plug to discharge contaminants.
  • Regulator: Compensation built into unit responds faster to changes in incoming pressure and flow
  • Built-in dual PSIG|Bar pressure dial gauge.
  • Lubricator: Built-in check valve permits tool to be filled with oil without having to turn off air pressure
  • Adjustable oil drop to meter amount of oil into air system.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Parts

entry.title: 3M AM20623 - 3M Flange Adapter 4, 1-1/4 in x 1 in, 1 per case, Obsolete, Contact CPS to order product 1-800-843-0619 AM20623 7000120623
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 20.82

[shortdesc]

3M Flange Adapter 4, 1-1/4 in x 1 in, 1 per case, Obsolete, Contact CPS to order product 1-800-843-0619

  • Our 3M Flange Adapters adapt a wheel with a 1 inch center hole to fit onto a tool with a shaft smaller than one inch
  • They can be used on many types of tools including bench grinders and die grinders, and adapts flap wheels, deburring wheels, unitized wheels or any wheel with a 1 inch center hole
  • We offer two types: a stamped metal Flange Adapter 3, or a telescoping Flange Adapter 5.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Adapts a 1 in (2.54 cm) wheel core to fit various sized shafts smaller than 1 in (2.54 cm)
  • Conveniently adapts flap wheels, deburring wheels, and unitized wheels with a 1 in (2.54 cm) centre hole
  • Adapters work easily with most tools, and are used most commonly with hand and bench motors
    		•
